page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The country at present has many unemployed but so far, our part of the S.E.has not been hit very hard. Tenterden is a prosperous community. Most families with children have a car and many get away for a short holiday with their children. Those who can't, go out for day trips by car or by coach. Recently many more families are taking advantage of the Adventure type holidays, arranged for children on their own. Parents here like to know that they are well supervised. A greater variety of holidays like this are becoming available. The older people too like to get away. They save up and hope to take two shorter holidays in the year. One in the late autumn and one in the summer, preferably before August when the children break up from school. { continued
